official_title: A Phase 1, Multicenter, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Preliminary Efficacy of BMS-986393 in Novel Combinations in Participants With Relapsed and/or Refractory Multiple Myeloma and Determine the Recommended Dose for Each Add-on Investigational Component
inclusion_criteria:
* History of relapsed and/or refractory multiple myeloma (RRMM) treated with at least 3 (Part 1 and Part 2) or at least 1 but not greater than 3 prior anti-myeloma treatment regimens (Part 2)
* Measurable multiple myeloma (MM)
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status of 0-1
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Condition that confounds the ability to interpret data from the study
* Known active or history of central nervous system (CNS) involvement of MM

Note: Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria apply
